title: Flipcard
body:
Hey Madelyn. Here's the flipcard. It is NOT presentable yet!

When you have time, could you please answer the questions I have on here: Milton's requirements.
instruction: Click on the cards to do stuff.

title: IGNORE FROM THIS POINT ONWARDS
body:
Anything that comes after this block is not presentable, and should be ignored.

That being said, turns out I can make the content refer to the user by name: {{_globals._learnerInfo.firstname}}.

(It defaults to "{{_globals._learnerInfo.firstname}}" when there's no LMS).
